title: Dial Up the Vibes
description: Design tools, web standards, open source curiosities, and a couple of rabbit holes worth falling into.

links.title: Inspo
links.description: A curated library of well-crafted website components and sections, organized by element type and interaction pattern — updated weekly.

links.title: Detail.design
links.description: A collection of small UI details and interactions that make a big difference, curated by Rene Wang.

links.title: Design System Cookbooks
links.description: The biggest searchable collection of design systems from companies around the world, organized by industry and features.

links.title: AI Design Library
links.description: Practical guides, prompting techniques, and curated resources for integrating AI into a design workflow — built by Romina Kavcic.

links.title: Zed Theme Builder
links.description: Zed's new visual theme editor lets you craft editor themes with a live preview and an inspector that shows exactly which token controls each UI element.

links.title: Variant Community
links.description: Variant's community space for product designers and developers to connect, share, and learn.

links.title: You might not need role="presentation"
links.description: A deep dive into the actual use cases for role="presentation", with real-world examples of how it's commonly misused and what to do instead.

links.title: Interop 2026 Dashboard
links.description: Live cross-browser test scores tracking the 2026 interoperability effort across 26 CSS, HTML, and Web API focus areas.

links.title: OSS Insight
links.description: Real-time analytics and deep insights into GitHub activity — trending repos, star history, contributor stats, and more, powered by TiDB.

links.title: Gboard Dial Version
links.description: Google Japan's yearly tradition strikes again: a fully open-source dial-based keyboard where you spin stepper motors to type — no keyswitches required.

links.title: Terror Vision
links.description: A cult label releasing horror soundtracks on vinyl, cassette, and Blu-ray — if you've ever wanted the Ghoulies OST on tape, this is the place.

links.title: The Infinite Conversation
links.description: An AI-generated, never-ending dialogue between Werner Herzog and Slavoj Žižek — everything you hear is a machine hallucination.
